description: This is a crude 1-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 5-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 20-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 100-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.
